resources.string: Congratulations, you escaped! Seriously well done I was not sure anyone would pull it off.
..this game is still in development and more levels and features will potentially be added if people want it.
This game is fictional but the situation in North Korea is very real, please Google it, pass on what you find, write about it, spread the word.

"Thanks for playing" 
 Developer: Matthew R. Jones 
 Special thanks: 
 webposters.adm.ntu.edu.sg
